If you count out the russians who need their own servers, the notorious cheating community, and the generell lack of commitment from valve towards improving this game you'll find a somewhat decent fps, which still is the best competitive shooter out there. which is kinda sad if you think about it. 

Prime-Status needed to atleast have a chance to play without cheaters on the server.
想要玩好这个游戏，我个人认为是1.清楚地图的各个点位   2.进攻、防守思路   3.定位   4.枪法   5.交流、配合  5. 道具和timing
